data.comment: The match is underway at Bosuilstadion.
The match is underway at Bosuilstadion.
Dieumerci Mbokani heads in to make it 1-0 at Bosuilstadion.
Oostende awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antwerp have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
Dieumerci Mbokani heads in to give Antwerp a 2-0 lead at Bosuilstadion.
Lior Refaelov with an assist there.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bert Put signals a throw-in for Oostende, close to Antwerp's area.
Throw-in for Antwerp in their own half.
Bert Put awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Oostende in their own half.
Antwerp awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Oostende.
Throw-in for Antwerp in the half of Oostende.
Ball safe as Antwerp is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Oostende at Bosuilstadion.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Oostende in their own half.
Fashion Sakala for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Oostende is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oostende will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Antwerp.
Can Oostende get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Antwerp's half?
Free kick for Antwerp in their own half.
Antwerp drive forward but Dieumerci Mbokani is judged offside.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Oostende.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Oostende just outside Antwerp's area.
Bert Put awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Antwerp in their own half.
In Antwerp a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Antwerp to take a throw-in in Oostende territory.
Antwerp's Aurelio Buta is whistled for offside at Bosuilstadion.
Bert Put signals a Oostende throw-in in Antwerp's half.
Corner awarded to Oostende.
Throw-in high up the field for Oostende in Antwerp.
Free kick for Antwerp in the half of Oostende.
Throw-in for Antwerp close to the penalty box.
Aurelio Buta of Antwerp is pulled up for offside.
Oostende have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
Fashion Sakala is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Antwerp Antwerp drive forward through Lior Refaelov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Antwerp Antwerp attack through Lior Refaelov. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Oostende goal kick.
Oostende's Fashion Sakala is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Oostende.
Antwerp awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bert Put awards Oostende a goal kick.
Throw-in for Antwerp at Bosuilstadion.
Throw-in for Antwerp in their own half.
Antwerp have a goal kick.
Antwerp drive upfield and Dieumerci Mbokani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Oostende defender.
Corner awarded to Antwerp.
Antwerp to take a throw-in in Oostende territory.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Antwerp in the half of Oostende.
Bert Put signals a Antwerp throw-in in Oostende's half.
Ivo Rodrigues gets his shot on target but fails to score for Antwerp.
The first-half is over at Bosuilstadion.
The second-half is underway in Antwerp.
Ball safe as Oostende is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bert Put awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Antwerp capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jelle Bataille (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Bert Put.
Antwerp's Abdoulaye Seck has run offside.
Antwerp awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Antwerp in their own half.
Corner awarded to Oostende.
Renato Neto (Oostende) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Antwerp at Bosuilstadion.
Throw-in for Antwerp at Bosuilstadion.
Oostende have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
Antwerp awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oostende awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Oostende.
Ari Skulason for Oostende drives towards goal at Bosuilstadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Oostende.
Bert Put awards Oostende a goal kick.
Antwerp have a dangerous throw-in.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Oostende.
The away team replace Renato Neto with Brecht Capon.
Free kick for Antwerp in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Oostende goal kick.
Throw-in for Antwerp at Bosuilstadion.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Antwerp in their own half.
In Antwerp a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bubacarr Sanneh is booked for the away team.
Oostende awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Oostende.
Antwerp are pushing forward but Alexis De Sart's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Oostende at Bosuilstadion.
Adama Niane is replacing Bubacarr Sanneh for Oostende at Bosuilstadion.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Antwerp.
Antwerp make their first substitution with Steven Defour replacing Alexis De Sart.
Adama Niane of Oostende gets in a strike, but is off target.
Antwerp have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Antwerp goal kick.
Koji Miyoshi (Antwerp) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Laszlo Boloni is making the team's second substitution at Bosuilstadion with Koji Miyoshi replacing Lior Refaelov.
Corner awarded to Oostende.
Bert Put awards the home team a throw-in.
Bert Put awards Antwerp a goal kick.
The match at Bosuilstadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Aurelio Buta, who is down injured.
Antwerp’s Aurelio Buta is on his feet again at Bosuilstadion.
The away team have replaced Kevin Vandendriessche with Louis Verstraete. This is the third substitution made today by Dennis van Wijk.
Oostende have been awarded a corner by Bert Put.
Can Oostende get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Antwerp's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Antwerp to check on Aurelio Buta, who is grimacing with pain.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bert Put signals a free kick to Oostende in their own half.
Aurelio Buta (Antwerp) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Ritchie De Laet.
Oostende to take a throw-in in Antwerp territory.
Antwerp needs to be cautious. Oostende have an attacking throw-in.
Antwerp drive into the zone and Koji Miyoshi is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Goal! Antwerp extend their lead to 3-0 through Dieumerci Mbokani.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Oostende.
Oostende's Adama Niane breaks free at Bosuilstadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Antwerp at Bosuilstadion.
Bert Put will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick in a good position for Antwerp!
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
Goal! Oostende reduce the deficit to 3-1 through Ronald Vargas.
Brecht Capon instrumental with a fine assist.
